balloon.content: Greetings are fundamental in Korean culture.
Los saludos son fundamentales en la cultura coreana.
This bike really flies! Can't wait to get to the plant
Wish I could keep up with you, Alfie!

left.balloon: ¡Esta bicicleta realmente vuela! No puedo esperar para llegar a la planta

balloon.content: Ahh, nothing like a good cup of coffee to start the day!

panel.below: In the middle is a vending machine

balloon.content: Who needs coffee when you’ve got a cigar?

panel.below: In the middle is a vending machine

left.balloon: ¡Ahh, nada como una buena taza de café para empezar el día!

panel.below: In the middle is a vending machine

right.balloon: ¿Quién necesita café cuando tienes un cigarro?

panel.below: In the middle is a vending machine

balloon.content: Just a hint of this and a dash of that, and..
You always did know how to mix things up, Alfie!

left.balloon: Solo un toque de esto y un toque de aquello, y...

right.balloon: ¡Siempre supiste cómo mezclar las cosas, Alfie!

balloon.content: Whoa! That wasn’t supposed to happen!

left.balloon: ¡Vaya! ¡Eso no se suponía que debía pasar!

balloon.content: I guess I’ll need a new lab coat
You look like you’ve been through a fireworks show!

left.balloon: Supongo que necesitaré una bata de laboratorio nueva

right.balloon: ¡Pareces haber pasado por un espectáculo de fuegos artificiales!

balloon.content: I am lost in your eyes.

panel.setting: lunar lander ascending from the moon
lunar lander ascending from the moon
